Lyric:
[by:小陀螺Tony]
[00:24.67]In the morning when I wake
[00:26.84]
[00:28.92]And the sun is coming through,
[00:31.14]
[00:33.18]Oh, you fill my lungs with sweetness,
[00:36.08]
[00:37.48]And you fill my head with you.
[00:39.78]
[00:41.59]Shall I write it in a letter?
[00:43.77]
[00:45.88]Shall I try to get it down?
[00:47.95]
[00:50.60]Oh, you fill my head with pieces
[00:53.40]
[00:54.88]Of a song I can't get out.
[00:57.11]
[00:58.26]Can I be close to you?
[01:01.14]
[01:02.05]Ooh-oo-oo-ooh, ooh
[01:05.98]
[01:07.39]Can I be close to you?
[01:09.71]
[01:10.61]Ooh, ooh.
[01:14.45]
[01:16.57]Can I take it to a morning
[01:18.57]
[01:21.04]Where the fields are painted gold
[01:23.28]
[01:25.22]And the trees are filled with memories
[01:28.11]
[01:29.54]Of the feelings never told?
[01:31.84]
[01:33.78]When the evening pulls the sun down,
[01:36.50]
[01:38.05]And the day is almost through,
[01:40.64]
[01:42.17]Oh, the whole world it is sleeping,
[01:45.30]
[01:46.66]But my world is you.
[01:48.58]
[01:50.33]Can I be close to you?
[01:53.25]
[01:54.06](Ah) ooh (aah), ooh (aah).
[01:58.07]
[01:58.93]Can I be close to you?
[02:01.22]
[02:01.38](Ah) ooh (aah), ooh (aah).
[02:06.78]
[02:10.82]（whistling……）
[02:40.68]
[02:41.83]Can I be close to you?
[02:44.26]
[02:45.31](Ah) ooh (aah), ooh (aah).
[02:48.73]
[02:50.31]Can I be close to you?
[02:52.91]
[02:53.32](Ah) ooh (aah), ooh (aah).
[02:57.68]
[02:58.87]Can I be close to you?
[03:01.32]
[03:01.97]Ooh, ooh
[03:05.99]
[03:10.22]
